title: How many $MM incentives should we provide to Cometh LP on Polygon
body:
We announced the collaboration with Cometh about one month ago to have Mushrooms interest-earing Vault tokens like mWETH and mWBTC listed in ComethSwap which is an efficient AMM on Polygon.

This collaboration allow participants to double-mine both $MUST and $MM tokens by providing LP in ComethSwap. Details could be found at https://blog.mushrooms.finance/mushrooms-partner-with-cometh-landing-on-polygon-970df7077250

Now Mushrooms community need to determine how we move forward in terms of incentivizing the LP on ComethSwap. We are also actively preparing more collaborations like Mushrooms-themed NFT collections on Cometh which is also a NFT gaming platform.

Currently Incentives(only $MM incentives listed here):
$MM-$MUST LP: 200 $MM per week
$mWETH-$MUST LP: 200 $MM per week
$mWBTC-$MUST LP: 200 $MM per week

#1 Proposal Suggested Incentives (only $MM incentives listed here):
$MM-$MUST LP: 200 $MM per week
$mWETH-$MUST LP: 200 $MM per week
$mWBTC-$MUST LP: 200 $MM per week

#2 Proposal Suggested Incentives (only $MM incentives listed here):
$MM-$MUST LP: 100 $MM per week
$mWETH-$MUST LP: 100 $MM per week
$mWBTC-$MUST LP: 100 $MM per week

#3 Proposal Suggested Incentives (only $MM incentives listed here):
$MM-$MUST LP: 50 $MM per week
$mWETH-$MUST LP: 50 $MM per week
$mWBTC-$MUST LP: 50 $MM per week

#4 Proposal Suggested Incentives (only $MM incentives listed here):
$MM-$MUST LP: 30 $MM per week
$mWETH-$MUST LP: 30 $MM per week
$mWBTC-$MUST LP: 30 $MM per week
author: 0x43229759E12eFbe3e2A0fB0510B15e516d046442
